item.description:
There will be over 800 athletes, 300 coaches and over 800 volunteers involved in this years SOCT Winter Games. The event will kick off with opening ceremonies Saturday morning at each venue, and a victory celebration Saturday night at the Hartford Marriot and Avon Old Farms Hotel.

Special Olympics is in need of volunteers for the Cross Country Skiing and Snowshoeing events.

It will be held at the Connecticut Light and Power Service Center in Simsbury, CT.
Lunch will be provided.

I will carpool 4 volunteers with me. Please meet at Wal-Mart in Hamden at 7:00 a.m.
I know it is early but it will be a worthwhile experience.

Call me at 561-635-3430.
Melissa
item.name: Volunteering for the Special Olympics Winter Games
